channel.title: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
channel.description:
[quote="Patrick, post:13, topic:13367"] Soon there will be separate repositories. Whonix and Kicksecure. [/quote]
I tried to update Whonix Gateway on VB (Linux host 5.10.0-14-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 5.10.113-1 (2022-04-29) x86_64) and received such logs about this. Is it normal? ``` user@host:~$ sudo apt update Get:1 tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease [39.7 kB] E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix' E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Label' value from 'Kicksecure' to 'Whonix' N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details. Do you want to accept these changes and continue updating from this repository? [y/N] ```

item.title: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
szewcu:

But why Kicksecure also wan’t to be changed to Whonix repo?

Updated…

Patrick:

Technical details:
Repository Migration

…just now to answer that question.

Read full topic

item.title: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
item.dc:creator: szewcu
item.description:
I’m little bit confused since both Whonix and Kicksecure give me that message. According to linked page Whonix should use both repos after migration and that is clear. But why Kicksecure also wan’t to be changed to Whonix repo?

Read full topic
item.source: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`

item.title: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Normal.

To fix:

sudo apt update --allow-releaseinfo-change

Technical details:
Repository Migration

Read full topic
item.source: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`

item.title: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
item.dc:creator: IMV
item.description:
tool to onionize all APT sources

Soon there will be separate repositories. Whonix and Kicksecure.

I tried to update Whonix Gateway on VB (Linux host 5.10.0-14-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 5.10.113-1 (2022-04-29) x86_64) and received such logs about this. Is it normal?

user@host:~$ sudo apt update                                                 
Get:1 tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease [39.7 kB]              
E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'
E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Label' value from 'Kicksecure' to 'Whonix'
N: This must be accepted explicitly before updates for this repository can be applied. See apt-secure(8) manpage for details.
Do you want to accept these changes and continue updating from this repository? [y/N]

Read full topic
item.source: `E: Repository 'tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease' changed its 'Origin' value from 'kicksecure' to 'whonix'`
